name: A Visit to Friends (itch)
description:
Make A Visit to Friends in these four RPG inspired dioramas. Step into the shoes of four unique characters, each with their own dilemmas and absurd circumstances.

((Warning: This game contains quick flashing lights))

  • Help repair antiquated transportation
  • Get told stories by a robot
  • Search for poultry
  • Talk to Spirits
  • Dive into your subconscious
  • Collect taxes
  • Grapple with life's uncertainties
  • Become lost
  • Chase bunnies
  • Buy candy
  • Forget to water your plants

All this and more!
